org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api

Interface DataTypeAdapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of entries that this adapter works on.
    All Superinterfaces:
    DataReader<Object>, DataWriter<Object>, Persistable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GeotoolsFeatureDataAdapter<T>, HadoopDataAdapter<T,W>, IndexDependentDataAdapter<T>, InternalDataAdapter<T>, InternalGeotoolsFeatureDataAdapter<T>, RowMergingDataAdapter<T,M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTypeAdapter, BasicDataTypeAdapter, BinaryDataAdapter, CustomAdapterExample.POIBasicDataAdapter, DistortionGroupManagement.DistortionDataAdapter, FeatureDataAdapter, ImageChipDataAdapter, InternalDataAdapterImpl, InternalGeotoolsDataAdapterWrapper, InternalRasterDataAdapter, LegacyFeatureDataAdapter, LegacyInternalDataAdapterWrapper, RasterDataAdapter, SimpleAbstractDataAdapter

    public interface DataTypeAdapter<T>
extends DataReader<Object>, DataWriter<Object>, Persistable
    This interface should be implemented by any custom data type that must be stored in the GeoWave index. It enables storing and retrieving the data, as well as translating the data into values and queries that can be used to index. Additionally, each entry is responsible for providing visibility if applicable.
